game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifacts from the lost temple.
game.description: The temple has been sealed for centuries, but recent earthquakes have caused it to collapse. Retrieve the three ancient artifacts before the temple falls further and becomes inaccessible.

task.objective: Enter the temple through the eastern entrance.
task.description: Climb over the rubble and enter the temple through the main entrance. Be careful of falling rocks and traps.

task.objective: Retrieve the Golden Chalice from the first floor.
task.description: Head to the first floor and search for a pedestal with a golden chalice. Bring it back to Gilbert the Guide.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the second floor.
task.description: Head to the second floor and search for a chest containing an ancient scroll. Bring it back to Gilbert the Guide.
